content: K1mc4n: Contributed primarily to documentation with two merged PRs (#4488 and #4542) that added Indonesian translations, totaling over +115k/-48k lines. Opened 7 additional PRs related to Indonesian documentation that remain unmerged, showing a focused effort on internationalization. Created 3 issues (#4565, #4561, #4770) related to CI/build problems, with 2 of them subsequently closed. Activity was sporadic, concentrated on just 4 days this month, with documentation files accounting for 87% of changes.
